Reviews.Title: “Too bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: Manabah
Reviews.Content: beacuse easter holiday price expensive service wifi description electricity night days tv service didnt clean day toilet rolls girl helpful smile maybe hotel 20 minutes walk centre amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Nowhere near as bad as everyone says.”
Reviews.Author: Emily B
Reviews.Content: booked hotel trip advisor happened reviews days trip naturally absolutely terrified reading awful reviews pleasantly surprised location hotel absolutely fantastic five minute walk leidseplein nice square filled bars restaurants coffee shops etc theres tram station handy catching trams city simple basic immaculately clean bathroom newly fitted bedding clean soft beds comfortable breakfast 5 euro worth breakfast hard pressed price local cafe price paid extremely value money renovations previous reviews lucky stay nicer 18 youre looking cheap cheerful thats close main attractions hotel perfectly fine

Reviews.Title: “avoid”

Reviews.Content: reason hotel classed disgusting reception hotel street arriving hotel informed reception staff mice card key doesnâ´t hotel tiny bedside tables coat hangers window lights clothes offthe cleaning 2 dayswe dare socks tread balcony trash cleaned weeks breakfast hotelits donâ´t lack eat location noisy near book hotel againthere plenty hotels hostels stayed hotels worst ive stayed hotels stay business

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected!”
Reviews.Author: KTBlonde
Reviews.Content: recently returned hotel de honestly enjoyed stay slightly apprehensive prior arrival following past reviews trip advisor arrival greeted friendly reception arrived prior check allowed leave luggage hotel including safes valuables explore amsterdam leidesplein 5 minute walk hotel restaurants bars tram line trams run 10 minutes amsterdam central highly recommend purchasing day travel pass returning hotel check provided 3rd floor negotiating stairs bit traumatic expected staying amsterdam definitely complain basic clean included bedding towels bathroom wet recently retiled clean view canal 5 minute walk main square noise minimal awake night actually kept bedroom window throughout stay breakfast served basic complain honestly stay recommend friends family refurbished avoid allowing previous reviews staying

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: sponge87
Reviews.Content: reading negative reviews looking forward staying hotel arrival greeted friendly staff allowed leave bags explore check hotel provided free lockers store valuables checked pleasantly surprised basic clean bedsbedding modern bathroom location tram stops 2 minutes corner near leidseplein hotel provided free breakfast located hotel street basic lot reviews suggested definitely recommend hotel basic reasonably priced location

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING - HOSTEL NOT HOTEL!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ruthless73
Reviews.Content: lacking basic cleanliness health safety toilet black towel refresh housekeeping 4 days extremely noisy reception located busy road free breakfast joke dog annoying location staff encounter friendly

Reviews.Title: “Congratulations to Hotel de Lantaerne”
Reviews.Author: BettyEdinburgh
Reviews.Content: booked short break ago treat mum endearing feature friendly laid receptionist location wept worst hotel ive seen tiny dirty smelly immediately search hotel slept public toilet spend night please heed negative reviews hotel truly hideous congratulations hotel du awarded dirtiest hotel europe awards proud

Reviews.Title: “Comfy bed, hot shower and a good spot in Amsterdam, what else do you need?”
Reviews.Author: sivalfa
Reviews.Content: spend couple nights hotel yes healthy unlikely according reviews hotel indeed hotel city prices reasonable location corner leidseplein walking distance museums standard amsterdam didnt bother day city sightseeing doover stairs steep overall decent extend couple days price complaints

Reviews.Content: dear planning visit amsterdam please stay hotel advice ignored staying hotel reception stay price paid hotel stole money bag time life feel insecure hotel breakfast real breakfast eat breakfast time found worthy bad luck leads hotel regards al

Reviews.Title: “Lay down your head”

Reviews.Content: im fuss try budget lay head night free breakfast morning read reports people book 1 star hotels expect 5 star people complain remote control didnt stairs adam hotels bed isnt comfy people annoy 1 star expect anyway title sleep cant wrong top floor hear noise late night morning actaully hotel givin price paid location corner couldnt hear noise smoke allow price book cant fault little yes wasnt 5 star luxury price compared budget adam cant swing cat enjoyed stay hesitate actually tried book upcoming trip unfortunetly booked anyway ive sleep free morning superb cant wrong booking

Reviews.Content: 9 m2 dirty blanket yellow supposed white arrived 13th sep 2010 hotel owner marnix hotel floor dirty cant live money backwe didnt stay 10 mins charge leave argueing hotel 15 mins 3 people money guy rat pillow hotel charge 2 night check stay hotel stay
